file_content.text: Damage report = major power loss // T8 = unable to help expedition // Query = Jedi seeks Master Tykan?
T8 = expedition survey droid // Parameters = analysis + records + general assistance // T8 = happy to help
Expedition = 0.5 kilometers off-course // This area = unsafe // Expedition = attacked by hostiles
Master Tykan = left before attack // Master Tykan + scout team = surveying area // Master Tykan = lost = finding landmarks
T8 = always honest // Jedi = can check memory core
Master Tykan + scout team = not far // T8 = has coordinates
Master Tykan + scout team = carrying expedition finds // Finds = medical holocrons + relics // Master Tykan + scout team = target to hostiles
T8 = doing self-repair // T8 = not valuable to hostiles // T8 = will return to base
T8 = likes Jedi // T8 = hopes Master Tykan + scout team still functioning
T8-C3 = sorry // Program = doesn't talk to strangers
